meanings.definition: Deejays (verb): to work as a disc jockey, playing and mixing recorded music for an audience
meanings.sent1: She deejays at the local radio station every Friday night.
meanings.sent2: He deejays at parties, making sure everyone dances to the music.
meanings.sent3: The cat deejays a playlist of meows and purrs for the birds outside.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers deejay the piano keys like a maestro conducting a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The sun deejays the colors of the sky at dawn and dusk.

meanings.definition: Deejays (noun): individuals who work as disc jockeys, playing and mixing recorded music for an audience
meanings.sent1: The deejays at the club kept the party alive with their music selection.
meanings.sent2: Many deejays have a passion for creating the perfect playlist for their listeners.
meanings.sent3: The deejays in the kitchen mixed up a delicious musical stew for the guests.
meanings.sent4: The deejays of nature orchestrate a symphony of sounds in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The deejays of the night sky spin the stars into a celestial dance.
